useCase.name: View System Messages
useCase.description: Allows the user to view system messages.
useCase.trigger: 用户 opens the mini program and requests to view system messages.

mainSequence.step: Mini program loads the system messages module.
Mini program requests the system messages module to fetch system messages.
System messages module queries and returns the unread message list to the mini program.
Mini program displays a notification for unread messages.
Mini program requests the system messages module to fetch the message content.
System messages module queries and returns the message content to the mini program.
Mini program displays the message content.
